question: Match List-I with List-II for the following reaction pattern of Glucose:
List-I (Reagents): a. Acetic anhydride, b. Bromine water, c. Hydroiodic acid, d. Hydrogen cyanide
List-II (Structural prediction): i. Glucose has an aldehyde group, ii. Glucose has a straight chain of six carbon atoms, iii. Glucose has five hydroxyl group, iv. Glucose has a carbonyl group
explanation: b. Bromine water -> Gluconic acid (Aldehyde group) [i]
